scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p lib && ncp src lib && npm run bundle
scripts.bundle:
cat ./src/mixins/resets.scss ./src/mixins/utils.scss ./src/mixins/selectors.scss ./src/mixins/alignments.scss ./src/mixins/attributes.scss ./src/mixins/boxes.scss ./src/mixins/features.scss ./src/mixins/media.scss ./src/mixins/palette.scss ./src/mixins/typography.scss ./src/mixins/components.scss ./src/minuet.scss > ./lib/minuet.bundle.scss && sed -i 's/^[[:space:]]*@import.*$//g;s/^[[:space:]]*\/\/.*$//g;s/^[[:space:]]*\/\*.*$//g;/^[[:space:]]*$/d' ./lib/minuet.bundle.scss && sed -i '1s/^/\/*! minuet, Â© Andrew Wei *\/\
/' ./lib/minuet.bundle.scss
scripts.test: echo "There are no tests in this package yet"
